016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.snapshot;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.context.DomainEventMetadata;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity.Entity;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity.EntitySnapshot;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client.Cypher;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client.GraphDatabase;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client.RowModel;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAutoDetect;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.PropertyAccessor;
026import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
028import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
029import jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException;
030import org.neo4j.graphdb.Result;
031
032import java.io.IOException;
033import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
034import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Objects;
037import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
038import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
039import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
040import java.util.function.Function;
041
042public class Neo4jEntitySnapshotLoader {
043
044    private final ObjectMapper objectMapper;
045    private GraphDatabase database;
046    private Map<Class<?>, String> cypherCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
047
048
049    public Neo4jEntitySnapshotLoader(GraphDatabase database) {
050
051        this.database = database;
052        this.objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
053        objectMapper.setVisibility(PropertyAccessor.ALL, JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.ANY);
054    }
055
056    public <T extends EntitySnapshot> T load(DomainEventMetadata metadata, Entity<T> entity)
057            throws IOException {
058        String cypher = cypherCache.computeIfAbsent(entity.getClass(),
059                new Function<Class<?>, String>() {
060                    @Override
061                    public String apply(Class clazz) {
062                        String statementFile = "META-INF/neo4j/snapshot/" + clazz.getSimpleName() + ".cyp";
063                        try {
064                            return new String(Objects.requireNonNull(ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(statementFile)).readAllBytes(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
065                        } catch (IOException e) {
066                            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
067                        }
068                    }
069                });
070
071        Map<String, Object> metadataMap = Cypher.toMap(metadata.context().metadata());
072
073        return database.execute(cypher, Map.of("metadata", metadataMap), 30)
074                .thenCompose(result ->
075                {
076                    try (result) {
077                        AtomicReference<T> snapshot = new AtomicReference<>();
078                        result.getResult().accept(new Result.ResultVisitor<Exception>() {
079                            @Override
080                            public boolean visit(Result.ResultRow resultRow) throws Exception {
081                                RowModel rowModel = new RowModel(resultRow);
082                                ObjectNode json = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
083                                for (String columnName : result.getResult().columns()) {
084                                    json.set(columnName, rowModel.getJsonNode(columnName));
085                                }
086                                snapshot.set((T) objectMapper.treeToValue(json, entity.getSnapshot().getClass()));
087                                return false;
088                            }
089                        });
090
091                        if (snapshot.get() == null)
092                        {
093                            return CompletableFuture.failedStage(new NotFoundException(metadata.getAggregateId()));
094                        }
095
096                        return CompletableFuture.completedStage(snapshot.get());
097                    } catch (Throwable t) {
098                        return CompletableFuture.failedStage(t);
099                    }
100                }).toCompletableFuture().join();
101    }
102}
